metadata.Title: CVE-2017-16868 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: In SWFTools 0.9.2, the wav_convert2mono function in lib/wav.c does notproperly restrict a multiplication within a malloc call, which allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (integer overflow and NULLpointer dereference) via a crafted WAV file.

criterions.comment: swftools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
